Nature of Self.quote: "The Self is pure consciousness, beyond all attributes." (Upanishads)

Self Realization.quote: "Know thyself." (Ancient Greek aphorism, Temple of Apollo at Delphi)

Higher Self.quote: "The kingdom of God is within you." (Luke 17:21)

True Self.quote: "What you seek is what you are." (Rumi)

Self Knowledge.quote: "The self-realized soul sees the Self present in all beings and all beings present in the Self." (Bhagavad Gita 6.29)

Self Awareness.quote: "The eye cannot see itself; but by reflection, it can see itself." (Socrates)

Eternal Self.quote: "The Self is never born nor does it die." (Bhagavad Gita 2:20)

Inner Light.quote: "There is a light that shines beyond all things on earth, beyond the highest, the very highest heavens. This is the light that shines in your heart." (Chandogya Upanishad)

Divine Essence.quote: "The soul is the truth of who you are." (Aristotle)

Self Integration.quote: "Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate." (Carl Jung)

Inner Guide.quote: "The kingdom of heaven is spread upon the earth, but men do not see it." (Gospel of Thomas)

Self Illumination.quote: "One who knows the self knows all." (Upanishads)

Divine Presence.quote: "Closer is He than breathing, and nearer than hands and feet." (Tennyson, drawing from Islamic tradition)

Self Discovery.quote: "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek." (Joseph Campbell)

Inner Temple.quote: "Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit?" (1 Corinthians 6:19)

Self Actualization.quote: "What a man can be, he must be." (Abraham Maslow)

Divine Reflection.quote: "As a mirror reflects what is before it, the heart reflects the divine." (Sufi teaching)

Inner Kingdom.quote: "The kingdom of God comes not with observation. Neither shall they say, Lo here! or, lo there! for, behold, the kingdom of God is within you." (Luke 17:20-21)

Self Realization Path.quote: "The path of self-realization is the path to God-realization." (Ramana Maharshi)

Divine Unity.quote: "He who knows himself knows his Lord." (Islamic Hadith)

Divine Potential.quote: "You are that." (Tat Tvam Asi - Chandogya Upanishad)

Inner Transformation.quote: "Be transformed by the renewing of your mind." (Romans 12:2)
